docs.lead_paragraph: Even with advanced technology to monitor the unborn, each year 27,000 fetuses that pass the 20th week of gestation and 13,000 that reach the 28th week or beyond are born dead.

headline.seo: Though Declining, Stillbirths Continue to Devastate
headline.main: In Decline, Stillbirths Continue to Devastate
headline.print_headline: In Decline, Stillbirths Continue to Devastate

docs.snippet: Even with advanced technology to monitor the unborn, each year 27,000 fetuses that pass the 20th week of gestation and 13,000 that reach the 28th week or beyond are born dead.

docs.lead_paragraph: I am back from two weeks spent hopscotching around the country, a mix of work and vacation. Among other things, I met scores of wonderful writers at BlogHer in San Diego — many of whom will become guest posters here over the next weeks and months. I also overdid the Mexican food in California, the stuffed pizza in Chicago and the lobster in Montauk.
docs.abstract: What do you think of the balance of light to dark on Motherlode? In your parenting world in general?
